name: @themaxdavitt/league-of-legends-unofficial-client-api
description: Auto-generated axios-powered League of Legends Unofficial Client API (LCU) client

scripts.build: rimraf lib && ts-node build.ts && typegen openapi.json > client.d.ts && tsc && cpy riotgames.pem lib && cpy client.d.ts lib

author: Max Davitt <max@davitt.me>
